text: "Only Women Bleed" is a 1975 song by Alice Cooper and is the second single from his studio album Welcome to My Nightmare. It went to number 12 in the United States, number 21 in New Zealand, number 1 in Canada and number 50 in Australia. It was covered by Julie Covington in 1977 and went to number 12 in the United Kingdom. ==References== Category:1975 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Alice Cooper songs Category:Guns N' Roses songs Category:Ike & Tina Turner songs Category:Tori Amos songs Category:Soft rock songs
title: Only Women Bleed
